casebody.data:
Friday, April 4, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

96-330. Cherovsky v. St. Luke’s Hosp. of Cleveland.

Cuyahoga App. No. 68326. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for continuance of oral argument currently scheduled for May 20,1997,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for continuance of oral argument be, and hereby is, denied.
